properties.name: badge
properties.description: Specifies a badge text for the tab.

properties.name: icon
properties.description: Specifies the icon to be displayed in the tab's title.

properties.name: tabComponent
properties.description: An alias for the [tabTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

properties.name: tabRender
properties.description: An alias for the [tabTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

properties.name: tabTemplate
properties.description: Specifies a template that should be used to render the tab for this item only.

properties.name: title
properties.description: Specifies the item title text displayed on a corresponding tab.
